code: import{cartActionTypes}from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:cartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.ADD_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var increaseItem=function increaseItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.INCREASE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var decreaseItem=function decreaseItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.DECREASE_ITEM,payload:item};};
